comments.name: Abgar
comments.comment:
Nice artikel.

I'm an Aramean from Germany, their are here in 120.000 Arameans in Germany and 600.000 in the whole diaspora.

500.000 Arameans where killed during the Seyfo (Aramean genocide of 1915)

comments.name: Syrian
comments.comment:
Hello. I read your article by coincidence, and I'm very glad that I did. At certain points you seem to know my country's history more than I do!

Nice job mate!

cheers
